A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really wanted to like this movie\, I laughed in a couple of jokes that the movie suddenly cracked\, my main concern is that it doesn't feel like a SW movie\, it feels like something completely new. Not everything needs to be Empire Strikes Back\, I embrace directors to take chances but lot of scenes feel just off\, in the end there is a lot information\, that was not revealed on episode VII and it was unnecessary held for this movie. The main characters did a great job kudos for Mark Hamill and Adam Driver\, but there is at least half hour of the movie that can be cut. Love the franchise but this will be an inflection point\, for me.
